author: roddey
msg: Got rid of redundant 'const' on boolean return value. Some compilers choke

author: roddey
msg: Added new C++ specific messages for new transcoder stuff

author: roddey
msg: Added new transcoders for intrinsic encodings.

author: roddey
msg: Added second getValue() method which takes a short name for the attribute
to get the value for. Just a convenience method.

author: roddey
msg: Changed to use new split of transcoder interfaces into XML transcoders and
LCP transcoders, and implementation of intrinsic transcoders as pluggable
transcoders, and addition of Latin1 intrinsic support.
